A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't understand how anyone can give this movie 5 stars. The whole movie was just eye candy while flat out telling it's audience to forget about the past Star Wars movies. The past Star Wars movies are the reason people see the current Star Wars movies\, and Disney just let all hardcore fans down. This movie was nothing but childish humor\, little to no character development\, with too many plotholes and writer's conveniences. They then either refuse to answer questions from previous movies or give the most uncreative answers ever. And what they did with the Luke character is beyond dumb. It's almost as if Disney is daring you hate this movie.
